demoAccount.instructions: Use the demo account to access all features. Record a video using the camera screen to see AI analysis in action.

reviewInformation.notes: Blaze Intelligence uses advanced AI models for sports performance analysis. The app requires camera access for video recording and analysis. All video processing happens securely on our servers with encryption.

permissions.NSCameraUsageDescription: Blaze Intelligence needs camera access to record and analyze your sports performance videos.
permissions.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Microphone access allows for comprehensive video analysis including audio cues.
permissions.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Access to photo library allows you to analyze existing videos and save your analysis results.
permissions.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Location services help provide relevant local sports data and training facilities.

privacyPolicy.dataSharing: We do not share personal data with third parties except as required for app functionality (secure video analysis servers).
